contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 14, 1999 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (2nd and 3rd Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Second and Third Section) 25 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-23-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including The Girl I Left Behind Me. 15 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Ruth Pinney, Flugel, Markham Colliery Highest third section: Bream Silver, Nigel Howard (draw 10, 182 points)
1st Prize: £300.00 (Copperad Challenge trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Festival Challenge trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Midsummer Challenge trophy)
March 7, 2011, 5:12 p.m. March 23, 2016, 9:08 p.m.
1 Markham and District Band Nigel Seaman
2 The Egham Band Gareth Green
3 Blidworth Welfare Band David Hutchinson
4 Wigston Band Garry Sleath
5 Epping Forest Band Marc Easener
6 Cawston Band James Utting
7 Avonbank (Evesham) Band Dennis Grant
8 City of Bristol Brass Band Bryn James
9 Bream Silver Band Nigel Howard
10 Moulton '77 Band Geoff Riseley
11 Fulwell Band Torkjell Hareide
12 Corsham Band Michael Knapton
13 Chinnor Silver Band David Pegram
14 Milton Keynes Brass Paul Fensom
Unknown Result Rushden Windmill Band Andrew Keirl
